sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 13-chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Tom Brown, Marjorie Lord, Sidney Toler, Turhan Bey, Keye Luke
Directors: Lewis D. Collins, Ray Taylor
After wrapping up a tour of duty with China‚Äôs ‚ÄúFlying Tigers‚Äù during the pre-Pearl Harbor phase of World War II, Ace American flyer Jack Martin is asked by General Kai Ling to undertake one more mission: prevent the Axis powers from taking over the strategic island of Mandon!

26:58     CHAPTER 2:  The Rising Sun Strikes

metadata.Plot: Just before World War II, the Chinese and American governments mount a joint operation to prevent the Germans and Japanese from taking over the strategic island of Mandon.
metadata.Actors: Tom Brown, Rose Hobart, Edgar Barrier
